A collection of methods to be used across the game.

translatePainter(double, double) - Static method in class gametools.Game
Translates the camera position by moving the painter location.
Note: Only subsequent methods are affected, so the camera should only be moved at the start or end of the run method to prevent inconsistent results.
translatePainter(Position) - Static method in class gametools.Game
Translates the camera position by moving the painter location.
Note: Only subsequent methods are affected, so the camera should only be moved at the start or end of the run method to prevent inconsistent results.
trimSpriteSheet(BufferedImage[], int, int) - Static method in class gametools.Tools
Trims an array of sprites to a specific range.
turn(Sprite.Rotation) - Method in class gametools.Group
Turns all the sprites in the group in the specified direction.
turn(Sprite.Rotation) - Method in class gametools.Sprite
Turns the sprite in the specified direction using the sprite's rotation speed.
turnTo(Area) - Method in class gametools.Sprite
Turns the sprite until it faces the specified object.
